notice.ch: 先修流體力學,大三可選修，大學部六大專長領域

remark.ch: 先修流體力學,大三可選修，大學部六大專長領域

goal.ch: "To study continuously fluid mechanics from the last semester in general, to learn how to communicate with FLUID PEOPLE, and to gain some insight into the physical world of fluid mechanics; emphasize on basic viscous flows and compressible flows."
goal.en: "To study continuously fluid mechanics from the last semester in general, to learn how to communicate with FLUID PEOPLE, and to gain some insight into the physical world of fluid mechanics; emphasize on basic viscous flows and compressible flows."

outline.ch:
"Chapter
8 VISCOUS FLOW IN PIPE
9 FLOW OVER IMMERSED BODIES
10 OPEN CHANNEL FLOW
11 COMPRESSIBLE FLOW
Field Trip"

textbook.ch: "Text -- Munson's Fluid Mechanics (Global Ed.) by Gerhart et al. Other references -- Introduction to Fluid Mechanics by Fox & McDonald -- An Album of Fluid Motion by Van Dyke"
textbook.en: "Text -- Munson's Fluid Mechanics (Global Ed.) by Gerhart et al. Other references -- Introduction to Fluid Mechanics by Fox & McDonald -- An Album of Fluid Motion by Van Dyke"

gradMethod.ch: "Assignments -- ~30 % of grade Midterm exams -- ~30% of grade Final exam -- ~10 % of grade PBL -- ~30% Impression of your regular performance -- ~10% of grade (Bonus)"
